body: Which of the following languages are you proficient in? (Python | JavaScript | C#)
minimumRequirement: A minimum proficiency in Python is required for the job position.

body: Which of the following databases have you used in your projects? (MySQL | PostgreSQL | MongoDB)
minimumRequirement: Experience with MySQL is a minimum requirement for the job position.

body: Which of the following tasks have you performed? (Writing unit tests | Setting up CI/CD pipelines | Deploying applications on cloud platforms)
minimumRequirement: Experience in writing unit tests is a minimum requirement for the job position.

body: Which of the following frontend frameworks have you used? (React | Angular | Vue.js)
minimumRequirement: Proficiency in React is a minimum requirement for the job position.

body: Which of the following DevOps tools have you used? (Docker | Kubernetes | Jenkins)
minimumRequirement: Experience with Docker is a minimum requirement for the job position.
